entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
